charges.charge_description: 18:922G.F UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC. (convicted felon received and possessed firearm shipped in interstate commerce)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: INCARCERATION: 180 months. SUPERVISED RELEASE: 3 years. Special conditions of supervised release: Mandatory drug testing requirements are imposed. Drug aftercare conditions imposed. Defendant shall cooperate in the collection of DNA. FINE and cost of imprisonment are waived. SPECIAL ASSESSMENT of $100.00 is due in full and immediately. FORFEITURE ordered of those assets that are identified in the Indictment. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal to await designation by the Bureau of Prisons. Court recommendations to Bureau: The Court recommends that the defendant be placed in the facility located in Coleman, Florida, or another suitable facility.
